channel.title: How Can I add a ::coord command for DEvolution v7!
channel.description: How Can I add a ::coord command for DEvolution v7!!!????????

item.title: How Can I add a ::coord command for DEvolution v7!
item.dc:creator: @minikiller minikiller
item.description:
@minikiller wrote:

If it’s a 317 server, it should something like this…

This one is for admins only to do. if you want everyone to have the mypos command change (playerRights >= 2)) { to 0, if u want mods to do it too, change it to 1. Hope this helps!!!

if(command.startsWith(“mypos”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
sM(“Your coordinates are”);
sM(“AbsX: “+absX+” AbsY: “+absY+””);
}

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I add a ::coord command for DEvolution v7!
